properties.entry: INSERT INTO CORREIOS_SERVICE ( ID, ID_CORREIOS, CODE, DESCRIPTION, POSTAL_CODE ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
UPDATE CORREIOS_SERVICE SET CODE = ?, DESCRIPTION = ?, POSTAL_CODE = ?, UPDATED_AT = (SELECT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) WHERE ID_CORREIOS = ?
SELECT (CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CORREIOS_SERVICE WHERE ID_CORREIOS = ?) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS EXIST;
